Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
Deprecated Classes
org.yaml.snakeyaml.Dumper
          Dumper's functionality was moved to Yaml 
org.yaml.snakeyaml.JavaBeanDumper
          use Yaml.dumpAs(data, Tag.MAP) instead 
org.yaml.snakeyaml.JavaBeanLoader
          use Yaml.loadAs() methods instead 
org.yaml.snakeyaml.Loader
          Loader's functionality was moved to Yaml 
org.yaml.snakeyaml.LoaderOptions
            
 

Deprecated Methods
org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml.addImplicitResolver(String, Pattern, String)
          use Tag instead of String 
org.yaml.snakeyaml.DumperOptions.calculateScalarStyle(ScalarAnalysis, DumperOptions.ScalarStyle)
          it was implemented as a quick fix for issue 29 
org.yaml.snakeyaml.DumperOptions.getExplicitRoot()
          do not use explicit root Tag 
org.yaml.snakeyaml.DumperOptions.setExplicitRoot(String)
          use Tag instead of String 
org.yaml.snakeyaml.DumperOptions.setExplicitRoot(Tag)
          do not use explicit root Tag 
 

Deprecated Constructors
org.yaml.snakeyaml.resolver.Resolver(boolean)
          override addImplicitResolvers instead 
org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml(BaseConstructor, LoaderOptions, Representer, DumperOptions, Resolver)
            
org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml(Loader)
          use with Constructor instead of Loader 
org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml(Loader, Dumper)
          use with Constructor instead of Loader 
org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml(Loader, Dumper, Resolver)
          use with Constructor instead of Loader 
org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml(LoaderOptions)
